pictoLink.title: PictoLink
pictoLink.subtitle: Augmentative Communication
pictoLink.description:
PictoLink is a digital platform that combines artificial intelligence and pictograms to improve communication, especially for people with difficulties in written or oral language. Starting from a text, PictoLink generates visual representations through pictograms, making complex messages clearer, more accessible, and easier to understand.

Additionally, it functions as a kind of 'visual social network,' where users can share, comment, and reuse combinations of pictograms, creating a community focused on inclusion and universal communication.

nuestroBarrio.title: Our Neighborhood
nuestroBarrio.subtitle: Local Identity
nuestroBarrio.description:
'Our Neighborhood, Our Story' is a community project of collective memory that seeks to rescue, organize, and disseminate the stories, traditions, and experiences of the residents of a neighborhood. Through interviews, old photographs, affective maps, urban tours, and small workshops, the project turns personal memories into a living archive accessible to everyone.

Its goal is to strengthen the sense of belonging, make visible the people who build the daily life of the neighborhood, and leave a cultural legacy for future generations.
